name: bench
description: Performance benchmarks aligned with Bun's official benchmark structure

scripts.all: bun crc32-bench-mitata.ts && bun spawn-bench-mitata.ts && bun archive-bench-mitata.ts && bun ../../examples/bun-1.3.6-bench-mitata.ts
scripts.all:json: BENCHMARK_RUNNER=1 bun crc32-bench-mitata.ts && BENCHMARK_RUNNER=1 bun spawn-bench-mitata.ts && BENCHMARK_RUNNER=1 bun archive-bench-mitata.ts && BENCHMARK_RUNNER=1 bun ../../examples/bun-1.3.6-bench-mitata.ts
